screen_name: @NHSMillion I was admitted to hospital for 8 days on oxygen and I tested positive twice for Covid-19. On the day I was discharged my mum was admitted to hospital nearly 300 miles away, she was 76yrs old on her own with no family. All I wanted to do was be with her. Sadly she passed away

@tandgicft thanks for taking care of me, I tested positive twice for Covid-19 after isolating. I was discharged on 3rd April, still not 100%, temperature was 38 yesterday. Isolating for another 7 days. My mum sadly passed away on Monday in Scotland

@dianec23a @gmpolice @GMPSaddleworth It is devastating. I spent 8 days in hospital for pneumonia on oxygen and I tested positive twice for Covid-19. I have other health issues. My mum sadly passed away on Monday morning in a hospital in Scotland on her own with no family. I was self isolating for two weeks then ill

@gmpolice Some of these comments are unbelievable. I have just got out of hospital last night after being on oxygen for pneumonia for 8 days and I tested positive for the covid virus twice. I've self isolated for 10 days before this with underlying problems
@kennydoughty I still can't taste or smell anything, sad that people think they can do as they please.

@zubiedoo Hi Deb, I got out of hospital on Friday night. I self isolated from 16th March to 26th March and then got admitted to hospital with pneumonia on oxygen for 8 days. I have to keep a mask on while I recover at home. Can't even hug Christopher x x
@zubiedoo Sadly my mum passed away this morning due to pneumonia and testing positive for Covid-19. I'm so upset that I couldn't be with her. Hope you are ok Deb. X

@antongyan @PennineCareNHS My daughter died in Tameside general hospital on Boxing Day morning from severe sepsis, septicemia and multiple organ failure. She was sent away from the same hospital a few days earlier with antibiotics and told she had a water infection.
@tandgicft Nothing worked for my daughter, she was sent away from her GPs with painkillers. Sent away from a walk in centre with antibiotics only to be admitted to hospital a few days later.
